concept.title: Verifying a PIN
concept.shortdesc: To verify a supplied PIN, call the verb.

conbody.p: You supply the enciphered PIN, the PIN-encrypting key that enciphers the PIN, and other data. You must also specify the PIN verification key and PIN verification algorithm. The verb generates a verification PIN. This verb compares the two personal identification numbers and if they are the same, it verifies the supplied PIN.
